results.title: The Valley
results.creator_credit: Roger Scholes, Katherine Scholes and Edward Street Films
results.brief_description: Produced with the co-operation of the local community and World Vision Ethiopia staff in the Omo Valley, this film traces transformation of an area devastated by drought and land degradation into green and productive land, reversing the trend of environmental destruction and poverty.

results.title: The Valley
results.brief_description: A before and after story of the pollution of the Ohio River Valley. The pollution included sewage, industrial waste and mining pollution. The controls: monitoring of the rivers conditions, and enforcement of regulations governing the disposal of waste material have contributed to the improvement of the area.

results.title: The Valkyrie = Die Walkure
results.creator_credit: Phebe Berkowitz, Brian Large, Peter Gelb and Metropolitan Opera
results.brief_description: Includes guide in both English and German. The second installment of Wagner’s Ring des Nibelungen follows the tragic destiny og Brunnhilde, daughter of Wotan (Master of Valhalla). Sent by her father to murder Siegmund and Sieglinde, the twins borne to Wotan by a mortal, she is moved by the love she witnesses and disobbeys Wotan’s command. Wotan’s punishment is to hold Brunnhilde in a magic sleep, making her a defenceless prey for the first man who passes by and wakes her. Moved by his daughter’s plea for mercy, Wotan agrees to her request of being guarded in her sleep by a circle of flames that only a true and unrestrained hero can traverse to reach and awake her. See also: The Rhinegold (1) Siegfried (3) and Twilight of the Gods (4) of Wagner’s famous tetralogy.

results.title: The Valet's wife
results.creator_credit: D.W. Griffith and American Mutoscope and Biograph Company
results.brief_description: A farcical comedy on an allowance provided by his uncle and the lengths he will go to in order to increase his weekly cheque. Cast includes Mack Sennett, Charles Avery, George Gebhardt, Robert Harron, Florence Lawrence. Silent film with no intertitles.

results.title: The Vale of Kashmir
results.creator_credit: Stafford Garner and Australian Broadcasting Commission
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Journey into the Himalayas”.
The Vale of Kashmir has been the destination of tourists for centuries. Kashmir is renowned throughout the world for its exquisite crafts and exotic houseboats lining the shores of picturesque Dal Lake. Keith Adam looks behind the tourist facade to find the lifestyle of the real Kashmiri.

results.title: The Vacant lot
results.creator_credit: Judith Merritt, Derek Lamb, Stanley Jackson, Donald Brittain and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: The charming story of how a group of senior citizens managed to transform a useless vacant lot in Montreal into a garden of delights - vegetables, flowers, and parties. But the garden means much more to them than what it produces. It has completely changed their attitude about inactivity and retirement. Narrated by Patrick Watson.

results.title: The Usual suspects [DVD]
results.creator_credit: Bryan Singer, Michael McDonnell, Bad Hat Harry and Blue Parrot
results.brief_description: Usually when there is a crime, there is a motive. Usually when there is a line up, there is only one real suspect. However, this is not the usual crime and when five criminals are in the same lineup, there is a force operating behind the scenes pulling the strings to get them all together. “The Usual suspects” has an intriguing and twisted plot with exceptional performances from the entire cast which includes Gabriel Byrne, Stephen Baldwin, Kevin Pollak, Pete Postlethwaite, Chazz Palminteri and Kevin Spacey.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bryan Singer, Michael McDonnell, Bad Hat Harry and Blue Parrot

results.title: The Usual Suspects
results.creator_credit: Bad Hat Harry Productions, Blue Parrot Productions, Bryan Singer, Christopher McQuarrie, Michael McDonnell, Howard Cummings and Louise Mingenbach
results.brief_description: Held in an L.A. interrogation room, Verbal Kint attempts to convince the feds that a mythic crime lord, Keyser Soze, not only exists, but was also responsible for drawing him and his four partners into a multi-million dollar heist.

constellations_other.name: Kylie to Lucy
constellations_other.description: 'Did It Again' started the conversation about Kylie Minogue being more than just a pop star, it started to cement her status as one of the most important audio and visual artists of her time, but the video had an unlikely inspiration.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Bad Hat Harry Productions, Blue Parrot Productions, Bryan Singer, Christopher McQuarrie, Michael McDonnell, Howard Cummings and Louise Mingenbach
results.description: Held in an L.A. interrogation room, Verbal Kint attempts to convince the feds that a mythic crime lord, Keyser Soze, not only exists, but was also responsible for drawing him and his four partners into a multi-million dollar heist that ended with an explosion in San Pedro harbor – leaving few survivors. Verbal lures his interrogators with an incredible story of the crime lord’s almost supernatural prowess.
